column1: 2007|8:07 p.m.|And I could hear that there were fewer people in the little station when the train wasn't there
column2: so I opened my eyes and I looked at my watch and it said 8:07 p.m. and I had been sitting on the bench for approximately 5 hours but it hadn't seemed like approximately 5 hours
column3: except that my bottom hurt and I was hungry and thirsty.

column1: 2007|8:07|Bennie pulled the transcripts for that night. The first call had come in at 8:07
